Package jam.sort

Classes for controlling the retrieval, sorting and storage of data, including the user-extensible jam.sort.SortRoutine.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Controller Interface that a class for data taking must implement.
 

Class Summary
CamacCommands Class for storing and sending CNAF commands to the crate controller (which may in fact be the jam process using GPIB in the future).
DiskDaemon Writes events to disk and reads them back.
NetDaemon NetDeamon receives packets from the network and sends the data data into one or two pipes.
RingBuffer RingBuffer is a list of buffers which starts repeating after the last buffer is filled.
RingInputStream This class takes a buffer and creates from it a InputStream.
SortDaemon The daemon (background thread) which sorts data.
SortRoutine Abstract class for sort routines which users extend with their own specific code.
StorageDaemon General class to read and write event data streams from/to storage.
TapeDaemon CURRENTLY UNTESTED.
VME_Channel Represents a single channel of data that the acquisition electronics will read out.
VME_Map Class for containing a map of the ADC and TDC modules to be addressed, along with channels and thresholds.
 

Exception Summary
SortException Exception that is thrown if we have a error in sorting.
 

Package jam.sort Description

Classes for controlling the retrieval, sorting and storage of data, including the user-extensible jam.sort.SortRoutine.
